arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola has bizarre interaction with a reporter as Man City boss discusses Rico Lewis' red card in 2-2 draw with Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola gave some perplexing responses to a reporter when the Man City boss was asked about Rico Lewis' red card against Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: 'The data showed this' - how to hurt Man City
arts.sum: Crystal Palace handed Manchester City another title-race setback at Selhurst Park on Saturday with a 2-2 draw and afterwards boss Oliver Glasner explained how he picked out weaknesses in the defending champions' game.

arts.ttl: Man City's day goes from bad to worse as Storm Darragh ruins flight plan after Palace draw
arts.sum: To compound Manchester City's misery after drawing 2-2 to Crystal Palace, Pep Guardiola and Co are facing a four and a half hour drive up the M6 instead of a quick flight north after their flight was cancelled

arts.ttl: It's from bad to worse for Pep! Storm Darragh plays havoc with Man City's travel plans home after Guardiola's side drop more points away at Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Manchester City's Saturday went from bad to worse when their flight home from the disappointing 2-2 draw at Crystal Palace was reportedly cancelled.

arts.ttl: Juventus and Man City both held at 2-2 ahead of testing Champions League clash
arts.sum: Both Juventus and Manchester City were held to 2-2 draws in their respective league matches...

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola admits his side will have to 'survive' this season as Man City boss prepares for the worst after 2-2 draw with Crystal Palace
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola predicted Man City's difficulties will drag on for the entire season after their slim title prospects suffered further damage with a 2-2 draw at Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Thiago Motta on ‘right’ red card, Juventus fight back and Manchester City
arts.sum: Thiago Motta admits his red card for dissent was ‘right’ and Juventus only clawed Bologna...

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Crystal Palace 2 Manchester City 2 - Changed mindset bodes well for grudge match against Brighton
arts.sum: Daniel Munoz gave the team an early lead, getting in behind the City defence after four minutes and firing low past Stefan Ortega. Lewis enjoys playing against Palace, having scored all three of his Premier League goals against the South London team.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola appears to concede Premier League title – 'We have to survive'
arts.sum: Manchester City came from behind twice to secure a 2-2 draw against Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park on Saturday and they are now eight points behind Liverpool, who have a game in-hand

arts.ttl: PL talking points: Man City vulnerabilities laid bare by Palace
arts.sum: Man City are closer to the top of the Premier League table than they were at the start of the day but their 2-2 draw at Crystal Palace was another blow to their ambitions of making it five crowns in a row. But it is the issues out of possession which are holding City back right now - and there is no easy fix with big games away to Juventus and at home to Manchester United coming up quickly.
